title: Practice Challenge
description:
Create a simple gradebook:
1. Create an array of test scores: [85, 92, 78, 95, 88]
2. Display the first score (index 0)
3. Display the last score (use .length - 1)
4. Calculate and display the average score (sum all, divide by length)
instructions:
Create a simple gradebook:
1. Create an array of test scores: [85, 92, 78, 95, 88]
2. Display the first score (index 0)
3. Display the last score (use .length - 1)
4. Calculate and display the average score (sum all, divide by length)

hints.text: First: scores[0], Last: scores[scores.length - 1], Average: sum all in loop, divide by scores.length

commonMistakes.consequence: This can lead to errors or unexpected behavior.
This can lead to errors or unexpected behavior.
commonMistakes.correction:
Starting at index 1 instead of 0:
   array[1]  // This is the SECOND item, not first!
   array[0]  // This is the first item

commonMistakes.consequence: This can lead to errors or unexpected behavior.
commonMistakes.correction:
Accessing index === length:
   let arr = ['a', 'b', 'c'];  // length is 3
   arr[3]  // undefined - no such index!
   // Valid indices: 0, 1, 2
